mapper.select: select request_id, case_name, case_desc, prod_sub_no, prod_no, channel_into, status_conf, element_name, element_phone, element_bank, element_idcard, element_bank_mobile, test_data, createdatetime, updatetime from autotest.scene_cases_pool where request_id = #{requestId}

select request_id, case_name, case_desc, prod_sub_no, prod_no, channel_into, status_conf, element_name, element_phone, element_bank, element_idcard, element_bank_mobile, test_data, createdatetime, updatetime from autotest.scene_cases_pool limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into autotest.scene_cases_pool(case_name, case_desc, prod_sub_no, prod_no, channel_into, status_conf, element_name, element_phone, element_bank, element_idcard, element_bank_mobile, test_data, createdatetime, updatetime) values (#{caseName}, #{caseDesc}, #{prodSubNo}, #{prodNo}, #{channelInto}, #{statusConf}, #{elementName}, #{elementPhone}, #{elementBank}, #{elementIdcard}, #{elementBankMobile}, #{testData}, #{createdatetime}, #{updatetime})
mapper.update:
update autotest.scene_cases_pool
case_name = #{caseName},
case_desc = #{caseDesc},
prod_sub_no = #{prodSubNo},
prod_no = #{prodNo},
channel_into = #{channelInto},
status_conf = #{statusConf},
element_name = #{elementName},
element_phone = #{elementPhone},
element_bank = #{elementBank},
element_idcard = #{elementIdcard},
element_bank_mobile = #{elementBankMobile},
test_data = #{testData},
createdatetime = #{createdatetime},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
where request_id = #{requestId}
